info.title: SEO Checker
info.description: The API can analyze a given text for it's seo validity and can give you tips how to optimize the article to get a better search engine ranking. The API is still beta. Please report any bugs to markus@www-factory.de

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: The html of your article without the layout html

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword you want to rank for

parameters.name: meta_desciption
parameters.description: The meta description of your article

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to the article (Can also be an unpublished url)
